song_name: Why Don't You Love Me (feat. Demi Lovato)
lyrics:
6 contributorswhy don’t you love me lyricsverse 1 ryan follese
see i cant wake up
im living a nightmare
that keeps playing over again
locked in a room
so hung up on you
and youre cool with just being friends

prechorus ryan follese
left on the sidelines
stuck at a red light
waiting for my time
and i cant see

chorus ryan follese
why dont you love me
touch me
tell me im your everything
the air you breathe
why dont you love me baby
open up your heart tonight
cause i could be all that you need oh
why dont you love me
why dont you love me

verse 2 demi lovato
see im just too scared
to tell you the truth
cause my heartache cant take anymore
broken and bruised
longing for you
and i dont know what im waiting for
you might also likeprechorus demi lovato
left on the sidelines
stuck at a red light
waiting for my time
so just tell me

why dont you love me
touch me
tell me im your everything
the air you breathe

give me a reason
please tell me the truth
please tell me the truth
you know that i’ll keep believing
i’ll keep believing
‘til i’m with you

its killing me
so why dont you love me

cause i could be all that you need oh
